          <title>
            <string language="en">Rocks formed during the chemical weathering of granite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsen bildeten sich während des chemischen 
Weathering des Granits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roches formées pendant la désagrégation chimique du
granit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As rochas deram forma durante o weathering 
químico do granito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le roccie hanno formato durante il weathering 
chimico di granito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βράχοι που διαμορφώνονται κατά τη διάρκεια της 
χημικής διάβρωσης του γρανίτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rocas formadas durante el desgaste por la acción
atmosférica químico del granito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the other forms of rocks that granite breaks up into when it is chemically weathered by rainwater.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">felspar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">granite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">quartz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rainwater</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die anderen Formulare der 
Felsen, die Granit zerbricht in, wenn er chemisch durch Regenwasser 
verwittert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les autres formes des 
roches en lesquelles le granit se décompose quand il est chimiquement
survécu à par l'eau de pluie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os outros formulários 
das rochas em que o granito quebra acima quando é resistido 
quimicamente pelo rainwater.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le altre forme delle 
roccie in che il granito si rompe in su quando chimicamente è esposto
all'aria da acqua piovana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει άλλες μορφές των βράχων 
που ο γρανίτης χωρίζει όταν ξεπερνιέται χημικά από τα όμβρια 
ύδατα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las otras formas de 
rocas en las cuales el granito se rompa para arriba cuando 
químicamente es resistido por el agua de lluvia.</string>
          </description>
